title: New Bug Report: Authentication Issue
body:
Users are experiencing login failures after the recent update. This needs immediate attention.

## Steps to Reproduce
1. Navigate to login page
2. Enter valid credentials
3. Click login button

## Expected Result
Successful login

## Actual Result
Error message displayed

title: Feature Request: Dark Mode Support
body: Add dark mode toggle to improve user experience during night usage.
